methods.name: chat.getGroupPrefix
methods.desc: Get group prefix

methods.name: chat.getGroupSuffix
methods.desc: Get group suffix

methods.name: chat.getGroups
methods.desc: Returns a list of all known groups

methods.name: chat.getPlayerGroups
methods.desc: Gets the list of groups that this player has

methods.name: chat.getPlayerPrefix
methods.desc: Get player prefix

methods.name: chat.getPlayerSuffix
methods.desc: Get player suffix

methods.name: chat.getPrimaryGroup
methods.desc: Get player primary group

methods.name: chat.isEnabled
methods.desc: Checks if chat methods are enabled.

methods.name: chat.playerInGroup
methods.desc: Check if player is member of a group.

methods.name: chat.setGroupPrefix
methods.desc: Set group prefix

methods.name: chat.setGroupSuffix
methods.desc: Set group suffix

methods.name: chat.setPlayerPrefix
methods.desc: Set player prefix

methods.name: chat.setPlayerSuffix
methods.desc: Set player suffix

methods.name: dynmap.getHost
methods.desc: Returns the IP/hostname that the dynmap webserver is running on.

methods.name: dynmap.getPort
methods.desc: Returns the port that the dynmap webserver is running on.

methods.name: econ.bankBalance
methods.desc: Returns the amount the bank has

methods.name: econ.bankDeposit
methods.desc: Deposit an amount into a bank account

methods.name: econ.bankHas
methods.desc: Returns true or false whether the bank has the amount specified

methods.name: econ.bankWithdraw
methods.desc: Withdraw an amount from a bank account

methods.name: econ.createBank
methods.desc: Creates a bank account with the specified name and the player as the owner

methods.name: econ.createPlayerAccount
methods.desc: Attempts to create a player account for the given player

methods.name: econ.currencyNamePlural
methods.desc: Returns the name of the currency in plural form. If the economy being used does not support currency names then an empty string will be returned.

methods.name: econ.currencyNameSingular
methods.desc: Returns the name of the currency in singular form. If the economy being used does not support currency names then an empty string will be returned.

methods.name: econ.deleteBank
methods.desc: Deletes a bank account with the specified name.

methods.name: econ.depositPlayer
methods.desc: Deposit an amount to a player

methods.name: econ.format
methods.desc: Format amount into a human readable String This provides translation into economy specific formatting to improve consistency between plugins.

methods.name: econ.getBalance
methods.desc: Gets balance of a player

methods.name: econ.getBanks
methods.desc: Gets the list of banks

methods.name: econ.getName
methods.desc: Gets name of permission method

methods.name: econ.has
methods.desc: Checks if the player account has the amount

methods.name: econ.hasAccount
methods.desc: Checks if this player has an account on the server yet This will always return true if the player has joined the server at least once as all major economy plugins auto-generate a player account when the player joins the server

methods.name: econ.hasBankSupport
methods.desc: Returns true if the given implementation supports banks.

methods.name: econ.isBankMember
methods.desc: Check if the player is a member of the bank account

methods.name: econ.isBankOwner
methods.desc: Check if a player is the owner of a bank account

methods.name: econ.isEnabled
methods.desc: Checks if economy method is enabled.

methods.name: econ.withdrawPlayer
methods.desc: Withdraw an amount from a player

methods.name: fs.append
methods.desc: Appends to the contents of the specified file. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in.
args: The name of the file to read.
The content to append to the file.

methods.name: fs.createFile
methods.desc: Creates a empty file at the given path.

methods.name: fs.createFolder
methods.desc: Makes a new folder.

methods.name: fs.delete
methods.desc: Deletes the specified file or folder.
args: The path to the file or folder relative to the server root.

methods.name: fs.listDirectory
methods.desc: Retrieves an array of files and directories that are direct children of the specified directory.
args: The directory that will have its files listed, relative to the folder that contains the the plugins folder.

methods.name: fs.move
methods.desc: Renames the specified file or folder.
args: The old path to the file or folder relative to the server root.
The new path to the file or folder relative to the server root.

methods.name: fs.read
methods.desc: Gets the contents of the specified file. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in.
args: The name of the file to read.

methods.name: fs.readBinary
methods.desc: Gets the binary contents of the specified file encoded in base64. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in.
args: The name of the file to read.

methods.name: fs.write
methods.desc: Sets (not appends to) the contents of the specified file. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in.
args: The name of the file to read.
The content to put in the file.

methods.name: fs.writeBinary
methods.desc: Sets (not appends to) the contents of the specified binary file. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in. The second argument is base64 decoded and then set as the file's contents.
args: The name of the file to read.
The base64 encoded content to put in the file.

methods.name: addEnchantmentToPlayerInventorySlot
methods.desc: Adds an enchantment to the specified slot in the specified player's inventory with the specified level.

methods.name: addEnchantmentsToPlayerInventorySlot
methods.desc: Adds an enchantment to the specified slot in the specified player's inventory with the specified level.
args: Array of {enchantment: 0, level: 1}-esque objects where enchantment is the EID-value from here: http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Enchanting#Enchantment_Types

methods.name: addToWhitelist
methods.desc: Adds the specified player to the whitelist.
args: The name of the player to be added to the whitelist

methods.name: appendToFile
methods.desc: Appends to the contents of the specified file. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in.
args: The name of the file to read.
The content to append to the file.

methods.name: ban
methods.desc: Bans the specified player.
args: The name of the player to be banned.

methods.name: banIP
methods.desc: Bans the specified IP.

methods.name: banWithReason
methods.desc: Bans the specified player with the specified reason.
args: The name of the player to be banned.
The reason the player is being banned.

methods.name: broadcast
methods.desc: Send a message to every player on the server.

methods.name: broadcastWithName
methods.desc: Similar to broadcast, but lets you specify a name to chat as and displays the message with the proper format. Looks just like the person specified is on the esrver.

methods.name: clearPlayerInventorySlot
methods.desc: Removes everything from the specified slot in the player's inventory.

methods.name: deleteFileOrFolder
methods.desc: Deletes the specified file or folder.
args: The path to the file or folder relative to the server root.

methods.name: deopPlayer
methods.desc: Deops the specified player.
args: The name of the player to be deopped.

methods.name: disablePlugin
methods.desc: Disables the specified plugin. Attempting to disable a plugin that is not enabled will have no effect.
args: The name of the plugin to disable

methods.name: disablePlugins
methods.desc: Disables all plugins on the server.

methods.name: editPropertiesFile
methods.desc: Sets the specified key of the specified file to the specified value with the specified type. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in.
args: The name of the .properties file to edit WITHOUT the extentions. (server, not server.properties)
The type of value. Options are boolean, long, int, string and double.
The key that will have value set to it.
The value to set key to as A STRING. This means that true will be come "true" and 1.5 will become "1.5".

methods.name: enablePlugin
methods.desc: Enables the specified plugin. Attempting to enable a plugin that is already enabled will have no effect.
args: The name of the plugin to enable

methods.name: getBannedIPs
methods.desc: Gets the IPs on the ban list.

methods.name: getBannedPlayers
methods.desc: Gets the players on the ban list.

methods.name: getBinaryFileBase64
methods.desc: Gets the binary contents of the specified file encoded in base64. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in.
args: The name of the file to read.

methods.name: getBlock
methods.desc: Retrieves the block in the specified world at the specified coordinate.

methods.name: getBukkitVersion
methods.desc: Gets the Bukkit version that this server is running.

methods.name: getDirectory
methods.desc: Retrieves an array of files and directories that exist in the specified directory.
args: The directory that will have its files listed, relative to the folder that contains the the plugins folder.

methods.name: getFileContents
methods.desc: Gets the contents of the specified file. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in.
args: The name of the file to read.

methods.name: getLatestChats
methods.desc: Gets up to the last 50 lines in chat. Returned as an array of JSON stream objects.

methods.name: getLatestChatsWithLimit
methods.desc: Gets up to the last n lines in chat where n is the limit passed. Returned as an array of JSON stream objects.
args: The maximum number of items to return.

methods.name: getLatestConnections
methods.desc: Gets up to the last 50 connections/disconnections. Returned as an array of JSON stream objects.

methods.name: getLatestConnectionsWithLimit
methods.desc: Gets up to the last n connections/disconnections where n is the limit passed. Returned as an array of JSON stream objects.
args: The maximum number of items to return.

methods.name: getLatestConsoleLogs
methods.desc: Gets up to the last 50 lines in the console. Returned as an array of JSON stream objects.

methods.name: getLatestConsoleLogsWithLimit
methods.desc: Gets up to the last n lines in the console where n is the limit passed. Returned as an array of JSON stream objects.
args: The maximum number of items to return.

methods.name: getMotd
methods.desc: Gets server's MOTD

methods.name: getOfflinePlayer
methods.desc: Gets an offlinePlayer object representing the specified person.

methods.name: getOfflinePlayerNames
methods.desc: Retrieves an array of the names of all the players who have ever played on the server but are not currently on the server.

methods.name: getOfflinePlayers
methods.desc: Retrieves an array of all the players who have ever played on the server but are not currently on the server.

methods.name: getOnlinePlayerNamesInWorld
methods.desc: Retrieves an array of the names of all the players currently in the given world.

methods.name: getOpList
methods.desc: Gets the players who are opped.

methods.name: getPlayer
methods.desc: Gets a |player| object representing the specified person.

methods.name: getPlayerCount
methods.desc: Gets the amount of players currently on the server.

methods.name: getPlayerLimit
methods.desc: Gets the maximum amount of players allowed on the server.

methods.name: getPlayerNames
methods.desc: Retrieves an array of the names of all the players currently on the server.

methods.name: getPlayers
methods.desc: Gets an array of |player| objects that represent all of the players on the server.

methods.name: getPlugin
methods.desc: Gets the |plugin| object for the plugin with the given name.
args: The name of the plugin to fetch

methods.name: getPluginFiles
methods.desc: Retrives an array of files and directories that exist in the plugins data folder. Recursive.
args: The plugin that will have its files listed.

methods.name: getPluginVersion
methods.desc: Gets version of a plugin.

methods.name: getPlugins
methods.desc: Gets an array of all loaded plugins.

methods.name: getPropertiesFile
methods.desc: Gets a key value set for the specified properties file. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in.
args: The name of the properties file to read.

methods.name: getServer
methods.desc: Gets server information: maxPlayers, players, port, name, serverName, version, worlds.

methods.name: getServerIp
methods.desc: Get the IP that this server is bound to or empty string if not specified.

methods.name: getServerPort
methods.desc: Get the game port that the server runs on.

methods.name: getServerVersion
methods.desc: Gets the version string of this server implementation.

methods.name: getSingleDirectory
methods.desc: Retrieves an array of files and directories that are direct children of the specified directory.
args: The directory that will have its files listed, relative to the folder that contains the the plugins folder.

methods.name: getStream
methods.desc: Returns all the messages in a stream with the given name.
args: The name of the stream to fetch messages from.

methods.name: getStreamWithLimit
methods.desc: Returns all the messages in a stream with the given name.
args: The name of the stream to fetch messages from.
The number of messages to limit the results to.

methods.name: getWhitelist
methods.desc: Gets the players on the whitelist.

methods.name: getWorld
methods.desc: Gets the |world| object with the given name.
args: Name of the world to get

methods.name: getWorldNames
methods.desc: Gets an array of all the world names on the server.

methods.name: getWorlds
methods.desc: Gets an array of all the |world| objects on the server.

methods.name: givePlayerItem
methods.desc: Gives the specified player the specified quanity of the item id by placing it in the first empty slot.

methods.name: givePlayerItemDrop
methods.desc: Gives the specified player the specified quanity of the item id by dropping it in front of them.

methods.name: givePlayerItemDropWithData
methods.desc: Gives the specified player the specified quanity of the item id with the specified data by dropping it in front of them.
args: Decimal representation of the data value.

methods.name: givePlayerItemWithData
methods.desc: Gives the specified player the specified quanity of the item id with the specified data by placing it in the first empty slot.
args: Decimal representation of the data value.

methods.name: kickPlayer
methods.desc: Kick a player with the specified name and the optional message.
args: Custom message to display to the player after they are kicked

methods.name: opPlayer
methods.desc: Ops the specified player.
args: The name of the player to be opped.

methods.name: reloadServer
methods.desc: Reloads the server, refreshing settings and plugin information.

methods.name: removeEnchantmentsFromPlayerInventorySlot
methods.desc: Removes an enchantment to the specified slot in the specified player's inventory with the specified level.

methods.name: removeFromWhitelist
methods.desc: Removes the specified player from the whitelist.
args: The name of the player to be removed from the whitelist

methods.name: removePlayerInventoryItem
methods.desc: Removes all items of the given type from the given player's inventory.
args: Id of block type to remove

methods.name: renameFileOrFolder
methods.desc: Renames the specified file or folder.
args: The old path to the file or folder relative to the server root.
The new path to the file or folder relative to the server root.

methods.name: runConsoleCommand
methods.desc: Runs a command in the console.

methods.name: saveMap
methods.desc: Saves the map to the filesystem.

methods.name: saveOff
methods.desc: Disables automatic terrian saving.

methods.name: saveOn
methods.desc: Enables automatic terrian saving.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.desc: Send a private message to the specified player.
args: Player to whom the message is sent

methods.name: setBlockData
methods.desc: Set the data value of the block in the specified world at the specified coordinate.
args: The decimal representation of the data value to set on the block.

methods.name: setBlockType
methods.desc: Set the type of the block in the specified world at the specified coordinate.
args: The type ID to change the block to.

methods.name: setFileBinaryBase64
methods.desc: Sets (not appends to) the contents of the specified binary file. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in. The second argument is base64 decoded and then set as the file's contents.
args: The name of the file to read.
The base64 encoded content to put in the file.

methods.name: setFileContents
methods.desc: Sets (not appends to) the contents of the specified file. The file path is relative to the folder that the craftbukkit jar is in.
args: The name of the file to read.
The content to put in the file.

methods.name: setPlayerExperience
methods.desc: Sets a player's health on a scale of 0-4625 (level 50).
args: The amount of experience to set.

methods.name: setPlayerFoodLevel
methods.desc: Sets a player's food level on a scale of 0-20.
args: The amount of food to set.

methods.name: setPlayerGameMode
methods.desc: Sets the game mode for a player. 0 is creative. 1 is survivial.

methods.name: setPlayerHealth
methods.desc: Sets a player's health on a scale of 0-20.
args: The amount of health to set.

methods.name: setPlayerInventorySlot
methods.desc: Sets the specified slot in the specified player's inventory to the specified type with the specified quantity.
args: Id of block type to set

methods.name: setPlayerInventorySlotWithDamage
methods.desc: Sets the specified slot in the specified player's inventory to the specified type with the specified quantity and damage.
args: Id of block type to set

methods.name: setPlayerInventorySlotWithData
methods.desc: Sets the specified slot in the specified player's inventory to the specified type with the specified data and damage.
args: Id of block type to set

methods.name: setPlayerInventorySlotWithDataAndDamage
methods.desc: Sets the specified slot in the specified player's inventory to the specified type with the specified data, quantity and damage.
args: Id of block type to set

methods.name: setPlayerInventorySlotWithDataDamageAndEnchantments
methods.desc: Sets the specified slot in the specified player's inventory to the specified type with the specified data, quantity and damage.
args: Id of block type to set
Array of {enchantment: 0, level: 1}-esque objects where enchantment is the EID-value from here: http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Enchanting#Enchantment_Types

methods.name: setPlayerLevel
methods.desc: Sets a player's level on a scale of 0-50.

methods.name: setWorldTime
methods.desc: Sets the time for a given world.

methods.name: teleport
methods.desc: Teleports the first specified player to the second specified player.
args: The name of the player to be teleported.
The name of the player to teleport to.

methods.name: teleportPlayerToLocation
methods.desc: Teleports the specified player to the specified x, y and z co-ordinates.

methods.name: teleportPlayerToWorldLocation
methods.desc: Teleports the specified player to the specified world and xyz co-ordinates.

methods.name: unban
methods.desc: Unbans the specified player.
args: The name of the player to be unbanned.

methods.name: unbanIP
methods.desc: Bans the specified IP.

methods.name: updatePlayerInventorySlot
methods.desc: Changes the number of items in a player's inventory slot.

methods.name: permissions.addPermission
methods.desc: Add a permission node for a player.
args: The value to assign to the node.

methods.name: permissions.addPlayerToGroup
methods.desc: Add a group for a player.

methods.name: permissions.getAllGroups
methods.desc: Retrieves all groups.

methods.name: permissions.getAllPermissions
methods.desc: Retrieves all permissions for all players.

methods.name: permissions.getGroups
methods.desc: Gets the groups for a specific player.

methods.name: permissions.getPermissions
methods.desc: Gets the permissions for a specific player.

methods.name: permissions.removePermission
methods.desc: Removes a permission node for a player.

methods.name: permissions.removePlayerFromGroup
methods.desc: Remove a group from a player.

methods.name: remotetoolkit.rescheduleServerRestart
methods.desc: Reschedules the next server restart. The time parameter can either be in either the #h #m #s format, or the HH:MM format.
args: Time in either the #h #m #s format, or the HH:MM format.

methods.name: remotetoolkit.restartServer
methods.desc: Restarts the Minecraft server. THIS WILL TAKE DOWN JSONAPI FOR A SHORT TIME.

methods.name: remotetoolkit.startServer
methods.desc: Starts the Minecraft server. DO NOT CALL IF remotetookit.stopServer HAS NOT BEEN CALLED!

methods.name: remotetoolkit.stopServer
methods.desc: Stops the Minecraft server. THIS WILL SHUT THE SERVER DOWN AND WILL NOT RESTART IT.

methods.name: system.getDiskFreeSpace
methods.desc: Returns the number of free byte on the disk that Minecraft is located on.

methods.name: system.getDiskSize
methods.desc: Gets the total size of the disk that Minecraft is located on.

methods.name: system.getDiskUsage
methods.desc: Returns the number of bytes that have been used on the disk that Minecraft is located on.

methods.name: system.getJavaMemoryTotal
methods.desc: Gets the amount of memory available to Java/Bukkit/Minecraft. Note that is not a measurement of all the memory in the machine. To find system wide information look at getSystemMemoryTotal.

methods.name: system.getJavaMemoryUsage
methods.desc: Gets the amount of memory used by Java/Bukkit/Minecraft. Note that is not a measurement of all the memory used in the machine. To find system wide information look at getSystemMemoryUsage.

methods.name: system.getServerClockDebug
methods.desc: Returns expectedTicks, elapsedTicks, C, expectedClockRate, expectedTime, elapsedTime and % error

methods.name: world.getChestContents
methods.desc: Gets all the items in a chest.
args: The world the chest is in.

methods.name: world.getSignText
methods.desc: Gets all the lines of text on a sign.
args: The world the sign is in.

methods.name: world.setChestSlot
methods.desc: Sets the specified quanity of the item id by placing it in the specified slot.
args: The world the chest is in.

methods.name: world.setChestSlotWithData
methods.desc: Sets the specified quanity of the item id with the specified data by placing it in the specified slot.
args: The world the chest is in.
Decimal representation of the data value.

methods.name: world.setSignText
methods.desc: Sets all the lines of text on a sign.
args: The world the sign is in.
4 lines of text for the sign.

methods.name: world.setSignTextLine
methods.desc: Sets a single line of text on a sign.
args: The world the sign is in.
The line of text to set.

methods.name: world.spawn
methods.desc: Spawn an entity at the given location in the give world.
args: The world to spawn the entity into.
The name of the mob/entity to spawn. Comes from this list (case-sensitive): http://jd.bukkit.org/apidocs/org/bukkit/entity/EntityType.html#enum_constant_summary
